title: Expressions for Various Life Situations Quiz
description: Dive into a diverse range of Japanese phrases applicable to different life situations with this quiz.

items.question: How do you say 'I have a cold' in Japanese?
items.hint: Indicating that you caught a cold

items.question: What is the Japanese word for 'I'm lost' in a city?
items.hint: Expressing being lost in a city or town

items.question: How do you say 'Congratulations' in Japanese?
What is the Japanese word for 'Cute'?
items.hint: Describing something as cute or adorable

items.question: How do you ask 'What is your favorite food?' in Japanese?
items.answer: Anata no suki na tabemono wa nanidesu ka
options: Anata no suki na tabemono wa nanidesu ka

items.question: What is the Japanese word for 'I'm bored'?
items.hint: Expressing boredom or lack of interest

items.question: How do you say 'What's your phone number?' in Japanese?
items.answer: Denwa bangou wa nan ban desu ka
options: Denwa bangou wa nan ban desu ka

items.question: What is the Japanese word for 'Sunny' (weather)?
How do you say 'I can't speak Japanese well'?
items.hint: Indicating a lack of proficiency in Japanese

items.question: What is the Japanese word for 'Quiet'?
items.hint: Describing a quiet or peaceful atmosphere
